title: Arash B. Abadi
text:
A highly motivated PhD student in Lund and Randall labs at UAB, with growing experience in B cell biology in infection and regulatory T cell biology across cancer and obesity contexts. I’m actively building expertise in single-cell and spatial transcriptomics, bioinformatics pipelines, and machine learning, with a strong interest in their application to vaccines and immunotherapy.




Email: abaghera@uab.edu
Gmail: arash.bagherabadi@gmail.com
LinkedIn: arashbagherabadi
X: @arash_b_abadi






A comprehensive Quarto-based online HTML book for the PATOQ project, providing curated resources for learning Bioinformatics, Data Science, and Machine Learning.
